**Reasoning:**

* **Maximize Profit:**  Since you have a guaranteed buyer (John) at $120, you want to see if Bob will pay even slightly more. 
* **High Starting Point:** Starting high gives you room to negotiate if Bob tries to haggle.
* **"Limited Time" Tactic:** This creates a sense of urgency and might encourage Bob to act quickly.
